title: Crysis 2 x86 v1.1 Plus 14 Trainer-RazorDOX
description:
Join the TPB Family! http://forum.suprbay.org



Razor 1911 proudly presents:
Crysis 2 x86 v1.1 Plus 14 Trainer
(C) EA Games

Release Date: 2011-04-01 Platform: WinXP/ WinVista /Win7
Release Size: Small Game Type: FPS/ ACTION
Release Type: Trainer

Game notes

It is 2023, terrifying alien invaders stalk the New York City streets. Only
you can prevail, wielding the supersoldier enhancements of Nanosuit 2

BE STRONG Take on multiple enemies with Armor mode, mince them with heavy
weapons or squash them by kicking cars

BE FAST Get to the action quickly, then powerjump, ledgegrab and slide
round the environment with amazing agility

BE INVISIBLE Use Stealth mode to set traps or hit and run your enemies
or snipe from a concealed position

BE THE WEAPON With the Nanosuit, you choose how you want to play

General trainer information

Make sure to run the trainer as administrator
Before you are able to use any of the shown options below. You need
to press F12 first to enable the trainer

Ingame hotkeys

# Hotkey Option
F12 Enable Trainer

# Hotkey Option
1 NUMPAD1 Toggle Infinite Health
2 NUMPAD2 Toggle Infinite Ammo
3 NUMPAD3 Toggle Infinite Suit Energy
4 NUMPAD4 Toggle Super Speed
5 NUMPAD5 Toggle Super Jump
6 NUMPAD6 Toggle Grenade Master
7 NUMPAD7 Toggle Cloack Mode
8 NUMPAD8 Toggle Bullet Impact
9 F1 Save Position
9 F2 Restore Position
10 NUMPAD9 Toggle One Hit Kill
11 NUMPAD0 Toggle Slow Motion Enemies
12 F3 Toggle Super Throw
13 F4 Toggle Super Accuracy
14 F5 Toggle Super Zoom

Trainer notes

NUMPAD1 - Infinite Health

This option will give you an infinite amount of health

NUMPAD2 - Infinite Ammo

This option will give you an infinite amount of ammo

NUMPAD3 - Infinite Suit Energy

With this option your will be given an infinite amount
of suit energy

NUMPAD4 - Super Speed

This option will let you run around with the speed of light

NUMPAD5 - Super Jump

This option will let you jump much higher than usual. Make
sure to have infinite health enabled

NUMPAD6 - Grenade Master

This option will let you take control of any grenade explosion in
the game. You can do great things with this. For example:
throw a bunch of grenades on the ground. Hit numpad 6 and they
will not explode. Than when enemies walk you can let them explode
into pieces by pressing numpad 6 again

NUMPAD7 - Cloack Mode

This option will keep you cloacked even when shooting your
gun

NUMPAD8 - Bullet Impact

This option will increase the impact of your bullets
Every object you shoot in the game will fly through
and explode into pieces

F1 - F2 Save / Restore Position

This option will give you a nice teleporting system
Simply hit F1 to save your current position. Use
F2 to restore it back

NUMPAD9 - One Hit Kill

Enable and hover your mouse over your enemy and you will be able
to kill him with one shot

NUMPAD0 - Slow Motion Enemies

Enable and hover your mouse over your enemy and they will walk
in slooowwwmotion

F3 - Super Throw

With this option enabled you can throw every object you pick up
much and much further than normal

F4 - Super Accuracy

With this option enabled your weapons will shoot super accurate

F5 - Super Zoom

With this option enabled and pressing right mouse button you can
view much further than usual. You can easily look around enemy spots
to see what happens. You can also shoot your enemies from a very far
distance

Install Notes

1. Unpack the release with WinRAR or equivalent
2. Run the trainer from the desktop
3. Start the game
4. Toggle desired Options on/off
